    const [count,setCount] = useState()
    return (
        <div>
            <h1>{ count }</h1>

        </div>
    )
}

function Home(){
    const [keyword,setKeyword] = useState('')
    return (
        <div>
            {/* valueå®ç°çŠ¶æ€åŒæ­¥è§†å›¾ï¼ŒonChangeå®ç°ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ”¹å˜çŠ¶æ€ */}

}
